titleStmt.title: Answers for the Burghs Royal, to the memorial in behalf of the Burghs of Regality and Baronie and other unfree traders.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Concerns the Act of Parliament in 1693 which removed trading restrictions and extended the trading rights of regalities and baronies.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
